title: AWF Madison Appoints
content:
Williams arrives as group CFO.  
 

	Nick Williams has been appointed group chief financial officer at the temp staff provider AWF Madison. Having joined the company in August 2014 as financial controller Williams will replace Paul Mens, who leaves on 23 October. The appointment will allow Mr Mens to complete other projects. 


	With extensive finance, information systems, and operations experience, Williams has held senior finance roles at Hudson Recruitment Group, Tower Insurance and Fernz Group.
